title: So many fat cats on mardi gras..
content:
Popular costumes this year: fat cats and stimulus packages

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024045757im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Catnip%20and%20Stimulus%20package_4521.jpg)
  
Oh.. another stimulus pack-- AND CATNIP. IS THAT COSTUME NOT BRILLIANT.

Next we have a simple.. yet cute costume:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024045757im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Dow%20Jones%20Limbo_5144.jpg)
  
I am pretty sure that is rosewood (it says "Do the Down Jones Limbo!") on her back.. Limbo Limbo, Limbo

And for my personal favorite:  
I think this is self explanatory. The font works great..

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024045757im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bail%20for%20less_6401.jpg)

Here's a few more.. non political costumes:

Somehow this seems kind of dirty..

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024045757im_/http:/typophile.com/files/candy%20hearts_5073.JPG)

Another Brilliant costume. They blend in! if only these guys were around when someone parked in front of my boyfriend's driveway, trapping me and my two friends for the day!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024045757im_/http:/typophile.com/files/no%20parking_6197.jpg)
author: srquresh
